DOC.brief_summary: The study primary purpose smoking relapse prevention . This study collaboration researcher develop relapse-prevention intervention , H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center Tampa , Florida , associate `` New York State Smokers ' Quitline '' ( NYSSQL ) , Roswell Park Cancer Institute Buffalo , New York .
DOC.brief_title: Relapse-Prevention Booklets Adjunct Tobacco Telephone Helpline ( `` Quitline '' )
DOC.detailed_description: In study , approximately 3400 quitline client randomize one three condition point 2-week follow-up call . One-third randomized Usual Care ( UC ) condition , receive regular quitline service . One-third randomized Repeated Mailings ( RM ) condition , receive 8 Forever Free booklets sent mail regular interval period 12 month . And one-third randomized Massed Mailings ( MM ) condition , receive 8 booklet single mailing .
DOC.criteria: referral New York State Smokers ' Quitline least 18 year age
